query:
WITH RECURSIVE ancestors AS (
                SELECT id, parent_id, 0 as dist
                    FROM entries
                    WHERE id = ?
                UNION ALL
                SELECT e.id, e.parent_id, a.dist + 1 as dist
                    FROM entries e
                    INNER JOIN ancestors a ON a.parent_id = e.id
            )
            SELECT id, parent_id FROM ancestors
            ORDER BY dist
